name: LEGO Dimensions: Excalibur Batman Fun Pack
summary: Venture through the night with Excalibur Batman! Build the Dark Knight and place him on the Lego Toy Pad to bring him into the Lego Dimensions multiverse. Use Excalibur Batman’s trusty sword to battle enemies on the streets of Gotham. Unlock The Lego Batman Movie Adventure World and Battle Arena, and then use Batman’s Master Builder and Sword Switching abilities to win the day! For even more super-power fun, take a ride with the Bionic Steed and rebuild it into the Bat-Raptor and Ultrabat for additional in-game abilities.
